title: YET ANOTHER POST
post: This is another wee post to check the layout of the page.

title: Brief introduction...
post: I sort of hate the term 'blog', but I guess that is what this will be... Apart from actual changes in the content – the rest of this site will pretty much remain constant. This is the area I intend to post updates to. These updates may be thoughts or ideas, sharing solutions to problems I've encountered, or whatever. I will probably set up an RSS feed for it. We'll see...
